adjectives.description: likesome (comparative more likesome, superlative most likesome)

entries.meaning: Marked by liking or likability; agreeable; pleasant; pleasing to the mind or senses
examples: Right up from the south it rumbled, though it wasn't dropping any rain yet. It came like a live animal, reaching far into the heavens. Then, like one I'd seen years back, the middle of it turned a likesome shade of blue.
